questions.question: Imagine your life in 10 years time. What will it look like?

answers.answer: In ten years, I think that I would have an appartment with a dog or a cat and a boyfriend. I would have a job at the police force or I could be a criminologist.
Maybe that I would like to travel in many countries, I don't really know.
I would have a car that my parents would help me to buy it.
